variants.Description in input context: This variant results in a premature stop codon, causing a truncated and non-functional p53 protein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using HEK293T cells transiently transfected with either wild-type p53 or the variant P53 carrying c.729A>T.

Readout description.Result Description: Wild-type p53 protein expression was observed, while no functional p53 protein was detected in the presence of the c.729A>T variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed for each transfection.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type p53 transfected cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells without any plasmid (empty vector) were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: A p53 protein level greater than 80% of the wild-type p53 protein level.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: No detectable functional p53 protein or a p53 protein level less than 20% of the wild-type p53 protein level.
